publishers
Interface IMessagePublisher

All Superinterfaces:
IPublisher
All Known Implementing Classes:
MessagePublisherImpl
public interface IMessagePublisher
extends IPublisher

This interface serves as an extension to the IPublisher interface, adding methods to publish FillMessages, CancelMessages and MarketMessages.

Author:
Urvi

Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface publishers.IPublisher
IPublisher.PubType
 
Method Summary
 void publishCancel(CancelMessage cm)
          Sends out cancel messages for a specified stock to users.

          Sends out fill messages for a specified stock to users.
 void publishMarketMessage(MarketMessage mm)
          Sends out market messages for a specified stock to users.
